Traits.Name: Viral Load
Traits.Content: When a creature is hit by the Macro-virus's natural attack or starts its turn in the virus’s Aerosol Aura (10 ft.), it must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it gains 1 Viral Load (maximum 3/4 by tier). Each stack reduces attack rolls and checks by 1, and at 3+ stacks, the target is poisoned and cannot regain HP until the end of its next turn. A successful save removes 1 stack at the end of the creature's turn. Magical disease cures remove all stacks.

Traits.Name: Wall/Ceiling Vault
Traits.Content: The Macro-virus ignores opportunity attacks when moving from wall or ceiling to the floor.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Macro-virus makes two Syringe Stab attacks and one Claw Sweep attack.

Actions.Name: Syringe Stab
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it gains 1 Viral Load.

Actions.Name: Claw Sweep
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target has 2 or more Viral Load stacks, it has disadvantage on the saving throw to escape the grapple (DC 15).

Actions.Name: Genome Rewrite (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Macro-virus unleashes a wave of corrupted energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (4d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, the target’s speed is reduced by 10 ft. and their spell save DC or attack rolls are reduced by 1 until the end of their next turn for each stack of Viral Load (minimum of -1, maximum of -3).
